TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OleDbCommand : System.Data.Common.DbCommand, ICloneable, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbCommand extends System.Data.Common.DbCommand implements class System.Data.IDbCommand, class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbCommand Inherits DbCommand Implements ICloneable, IDisposable
public ref class OleDbCommand sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommand, ICloneable, IDisposable

summary.span: 表示要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例时创建读/写属性设置为其初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to their initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 功能执行命令的数据源的以下方法： features the following methods executing commands at a data source: |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||执行返回行的命令。Executes commands that return rows. 可能没有所需如果使用效果执行命令，例如 SQL SET 语句。 may not have the effect that you want if used to execute commands such as SQL SET statements.| ||执行命令，例如 SQL INSERT、 DELETE、 更新和一组语句。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||检索单个值，例如，从数据库的聚合值。Retrieves a single value, for example, an aggregate value from a database.| 你可以重置属性和重复使用对象。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 但是，你必须关闭便可以执行新的或以前的命令之前。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果致命（例如，SQL Server 严重性级别为 20 或更高版本） 生成的方法执行、 ，连接可能会关闭。If a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater) is generated by the method executing an , the , the connection may be closed. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下面的示例使用、 以及和，以从 Access 数据库选择行。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from an Access database. 实心随后会返回。The filled is then returned. 该示例传递一个已初始化，连接字符串、 是一个 SQL SELECT 语句，查询字符串和是源数据库表的名称的字符串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the source database table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试取消执行 。

span.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的命令，则不会有任何反应。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，将执行它，然后取消执行。The following example creates an , executes it, and then cancels the execution. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递是一个 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和字符串要用于连接到数据源。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Cancel Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.ADO.Design.OleDbCommandTextEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute at the data source.

value.span: 要执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`、属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 用户可能需要使用转义符语法，如果存储的过程名称包含任何特殊字符。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 当你调用之一时，该命令将执行此存储的过程`Execute`方法。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods. 当设置为`TableDirect`、属性应设置为表或表的名称，以访问。When is set to `TableDirect`, the property should be set to the name of the table or tables to be accessed. 用户可能需要的任何命名的表包含任何特殊字符时，请使用转义符语法。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if any of the named tables contain any special characters. 当你调用之一时，将返回所有行和列的指定的表或表`Execute`方法。All rows and columns of the named table or tables will be returned when you call one of the `Execute` methods. 无法设置， ，和如果当前的连接执行的 execute 或提取操作的属性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. OLE DB.NET 提供程序不支持命名的参数用于将参数传递到 SQL 语句或存储的过程由调用时设置为`Text`。The OLE DB.NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL Statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号 （？） 占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如:For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此，在其中的顺序对象添加到必须直接与对应参数的问号占位符的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在终止对执行命令的尝试并生成错误之前的等待时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
The default is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为 0 表示没有限制，，应当避免在否则尝试执行命令会无限期地等待。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to execute a command will wait indefinitely.

Public Overrides Property CommandType As CommandType
public: virtual property System::Data::CommandType CommandType { System::Data::CommandType get(); void set(System::Data::CommandType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何解释 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the property is interpreted.
One of the values.
The default is Text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置属性`StoredProcedure`，应设置到存储过程的名称的属性。When you set the property to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 在调用 Execute 方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储的过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. ，和无法设置属性，如果当前的连接执行的 execute 或提取操作。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. OLE DB.NET 提供程序不支持命名的参数，将参数传递给 SQL 语句或存储的过程由调用时设置为文本。The OLE DB .NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to Text. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号 （？） 占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如:For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此，在其中的顺序对象添加到必须直接与对应参数的问号占位符的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法设置，和如果当前的连接执行的 execute 或提取操作的属性。You cannot set the , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在事务执行过程中设置了 ，并且 属性不为 null，则会生成 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果 属性不为 null，而事务已提交或回滚，则会将 设置为 null。If the property is not null and the transaction has already been committed or rolled back, is set to null. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用执行目录操作，例如，若要查询的数据库的结构或若要创建数据库对象，如表，或更改数据库中的数据而无需使用通过执行更新、 插入或删除语句。You can use the to perform catalog operations, for example, to query the structure of a database or to create database objects such as tables, or to change the data in a database without using a by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 尽管返回任何行，任何输出参数或返回值映射到参数填充了数据。Although the returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果发生回滚，则返回值也为-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后执行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 该示例传递一个字符串，例如更新、 插入或删除的 SQL 语句和用来连接到数据源字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE, and a string to use to connect to the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指定与方法对象，用于 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序执行绑定使用 OLE DB **IRow**接口是否可用。When you specify with the method of the object, the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB performs binding using the OLE DB **IRow** interface if it is available. 否则，它使用**IRowset**接口。Otherwise, it uses the **IRowset** interface. 如果期望 SQL 语句仅返回一行，则指定 也可提高应用程序性能。If your SQL statement is expected to return only a single row, specifying can also improve application performance. 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`、属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 在调用时，该命令将执行此存储的过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 支持使大型二进制值，以高效读取以特殊模式。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 在关闭之前，先关闭对象。Before you close the , first close the object. 您必须关闭对象你是否打算重新对象。You must also close the object if you plan to reuse an object. 如果使用创建设置为`CloseConnection`，正在关闭自动关闭的连接。If the is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the closes the connection automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后通过传递是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和字符串要用于连接到数据源执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. 将 设置为 。 is set to . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

span.span: Cannot execute a command within a transaction context that differs from the context in which the connection was originally enlisted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: 执行查询，并返回由查询返回的结果集中的第一行的第一列。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 其他列或行将被忽略。

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果集中第一行的第一列或 null 引用（如果结果集为空）。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索单个值，例如，从数据源的聚合值。Use the method to retrieve a single value, for example, an aggregate value, from a data source. 这要求更少的代码比使用方法，，然后执行所需生成使用返回的数据的单个值的操作。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations that are required to generate the single value using the data returned by an . 典型查询可进行格式设置如下面的 C# 示例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后执行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 该示例传递是返回聚合结果，一个 SQL 语句的字符串和要用于连接到数据源的字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

span.span: Cannot execute a command within a transaction context that differs from the context in which the connection was originally enlisted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OleDbParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取 。

span.span: Gets the .

value.span: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE DB.NET 提供程序不支持命名的参数，将参数传递给 SQL 语句或存储的过程由调用时设置为`Text`。The OLE DB .NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号 （？） 占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如:For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此，在其中的顺序对象添加到必须直接对应于命令文本中参数的问号占位符的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter in the command text. > [!NOTE] > 如果集合中的参数不匹配的查询执行的要求，可能会产生错误。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示其参数。The following example creates an and displays its parameters. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递，是 SQL SELECT 语句，并将一个数组的查询字符串对象。To accomplish this, the method is passed an , a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: 在数据源上创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`TableDirect`，不执行任何操作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, does nothing. 如果设置为`StoredProcedure`，调用应该会成功，虽然它可能会不导致不执行任何操作。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to should succeed, although it may cause a no-op. 在调用之前，在要准备的语句中指定每个参数的数据类型。Before you call , specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared. 对于每个参数具有可变长度数据类型，你必须设置**大小**属性设置为所需的最大大小。For each parameter that has a variable length data type, you must set the **Size** property to the maximum size needed. 如果不满足这些条件，则返回错误。 returns an error if these conditions are not met. 如果调用`Execute`方法之后调用，任何大于指定的值的参数值**大小**属性将被自动截断为参数，且无原始指定的大小将返回截断错误。If you call an `Execute` method after you call , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the **Size** property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 输出参数 （无论是否已准备） 必须具有用户指定的数据类型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果指定可变长度数据类型，你还必须指定最大值**大小**。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum **Size**. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并打开该连接。The following example creates an and opens the connection. 然后，该示例通过将是一个 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和要用于连接到数据源的字符串传递准备数据源上的存储的过程。The example then prepares a stored procedure on the data source by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法设置如果它已被设置为特定值，并且该命令正在执行的属性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果事务属性设置为未连接到相同的对象作为对象，下次尝试执行语句，将引发异常。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception is thrown the next time that you try to execute a statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值除非自动生成命令 (与)，在这种情况下的默认值为 None。The default value is Both unless the command is automatically generated (as with the ), in which case the default is None. 有关如何使用属性，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
